main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Clarksville, Ohio, on May 2, 1965, lasting approximately 12 minutes.
interesting points: The object hovered and zig-zagged in the sky, making observations appear as if it went in front of and behind the stars., The sighting was reported under a civilian source., The observation was concluded to be a satellite (ECHO I, ECHO II, PELAPS), The witness had believed they observed two satellites but not three., Experts noted that many reported UFO sightings are often identified as man-made satellites.
sighted object: One object that appeared to be a satellite
witness description: Mrs. Mary and her wife Jane
